string-array.name: msgMem
string-array.item: All your base are belong to us
I\'m sorry Dave, I\'m afraid I can\'t do that
Technically I was never alive, but I appreciate your concern

resources.string: Press \"Report It!\" to see the stuff
Something went wrong, please try again!
Congratulations! You are already member of the following groups and can start sharing rides immediately!
Let\'s start!! Invite your friends to join your ride sharing groups
Enter address or select on map
What are groups and why do I need them?
Why can’t I search for rides like other apps?
What will it cost and how do I pay?
(Number in brackets is members including the person who created the group)
We have sent One Time Password (OTP) to your Mobile
Link a wallet for payments. Click on \'Send OTP\' to create a wallet and link it now
Link a wallet for payments. Click on \'Send OTP\' to link it now

User agrees to allow iShareRyde to transfer amount to/from user\'s Mobikwik wallet to settle fare splits at the end of each journey undertaken by the user. These transfers will be undertaken only after confirmation of fare split by both sending and receiving user. Further upon completion of journey and subsequent payment done, the User will not claim any other charges whatsoever from iShareRyde or its partners
By clicking on the button I agree to the terms & conditions mentioned at the link below

1. Extra cash Amount is fixed at Rs. 50/- for a Minimum "Add Money" amount of Rs.50/- 
2. Sign Up platform, Coupon Redemption and Payment should be done on iPhone, Windows or Android App
3. Offer can be redeemed only once per user per card and is applicable for the "Add Money" payment done during the offer period on MobiKwik App
4. Offer will be valid only for the transactions done through Debit Card or Credit Card. Not valid on Net Banking and Virtual Cards
5. Offer valid for new MobiKwik user only
6. Valid till 31st Oct'15
By clicking on submit I agree to the terms & conditions mentioned at the link below
If you have open ride(s) invitations, they will appear here
Enter a brief but detailed description of the problem
*Thank you for reporting a problem!\nOur team will look into this issue and correct it as soon as possible.

string.name: underline_text_book_a_cab
string.u: Going alone, just find a cab

resources.string: Your wallet balance is low for this ride. Please recharge to join.
I drive my own car, why should I carpool with iShareRyde?
Share the cost and also you don’t have to drive everyday
Who will be travelling with me?
Any other verified user of iShareRyde can join the ride. We provide you details of who has joined.
Why can’t I schedule regular rides for the entire week or month like other apps?

We have experienced that it is difficult for someone to stick to the same time everyday and pre-scheduling results in a lot of dropouts \n\nWe’ve made offering a ride super simple so that you can do it quickly when you want to leave.
How can I communicate with people joining the ride?
You can call them from within the app

Ask the ride taker to press the “PAY” button in the app as soon as they get in the vehicle.

If they are paying through wallet it will be transferred immediately to your account.

If cash collect the amount soon.
We charge a platform fees of Rs.5/- per rider. This is deducted from the money transfer to your account. We don’t charge anything if you don’t get a rider
What if I need to cancel the ride?
You can do so from the ride page in app. We discourage cancellation after ride takers have joined because it affects their travel plans. Do so only if you can’t avoid it
What if I need to change the departure time?

You need to cancel the ride and create a new one – people who have joined the ride may not be comfortable with new timing and it is easier to create a new ride. iShareRyde is about sharing rides on the go – create your rides when you are certain of your departure time
I’m looking for a ride, why should I use iShareRyde?

It is the cheapest way to travel by car. You can get a comfortable ride in an AC vehicle for as low as Rs 4/km per seat. There are no hidden costs like minimum fare, per minute charge or surge pricing
I had joined a ride but now need to cancel?
We understand that plans can change. You can leave a ride but if you do so less than 15 mins prior to departure time, cancellation charges will apply
I see both private cars and commercial vehicles (cabs)?
iShareRyde is a platform where you can get a ride on personal carpools or commercial cabs. Including the commercial vehicles helps us provide more supply of rides for you
I need more than one seat, how do I book that?
At the moment, you can book only one seat from each account – your companion can also book seat on the same ride using iShareRyde. We are working on booking multiple seats from the same account

The ride giver should keep the car clean and comfortable for the riders. Use AC if weather demands it 

Pickup and drop points need to be at nearest main road. Do not insist on getting the vehicle inside complexes or narrow and congested lanes

Be at the pickup points in time

If you are carrying luggage, call ahead of the ride and confirm how much is ok

Before getting into the vehicle, make sure details match the ride e.g. Vehicle make, Registration number, Ride giver, etc. Refuse the ride and report to us if otherwise
